definition.en: A name. A word or set of words by which a person, thing, matter or abstract concept is known, addressed, or referred to.
definition.ja: 名前。具象・抽象をふくめた「存在」「ものごと」についている名称。

definition.en: A name (1 Name) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.1 - 1.12).
definition.ja: 名前の内、その下位のクラスに属さないもの。

definition.en:
A name of a real person. 
This includes a legendary person whose existence is questionable, and a common name or nickname that constitutes the distinctive designation of a person. 
This does not include a fictional character in a work (such as novel, play, or film).
definition.ja: 人の名前。伝説上の人物は含むが、創作されたことが明らかな人物(小説、映画、漫画等の登場人物)は含まない。また、人名の読み仮名や、ニックネーム、しこな等も個人が特定できるものは人名とする。

definition.en: A name of a deity, like a god or goddess.
definition.ja: 神仏の名前。

definition.en:
A name of an individual animal. 
This does not include a taxonomic name used for the classification of organisms.
definition.ja: 個々の動物につけられた名前。生物学的な分類を除く。

definition.en:
A name of an individual animal (1.3 Individual_Animal) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.3.1 Racehorse).
This does not include a taxonomic name used for the classification of organisms.
definition.ja: 個々の動物に付けられた名前のうち、「競走馬名」に属さないもの。生物学的な分類を除く。

definition.en:
A name of an individual racehorse. 
This does not include a taxonomic name used for the classification of organisms.
definition.ja: 個々の競走馬に付けられた名前。生物学的な分類を除く。

definition.en: A name of an organized group of people.
definition.ja: 複数の人間からなる組織の名前。

definition.en:
A name of an organization (1.4 Organization) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.4.1 - 1.4.7).
Examples are a name of a club, a division of a company, a department of a university, etc.
definition.ja: 組織名の内、その下位のクラスに属さないもの。例えば同好会、クラブなど。また、組織内部につくられた組織（部、課など）。

definition.en: A name of an organization with an international membership, scope or presence.
definition.ja: 複数の国の代表者から構成されている組織の名前。

definition.en:
A name of an organization presenting performances such as a play, concert or show. 
Examples are an orchestra, troupe, band, or a pop music group.
definition.ja: 公演活動をする組織の名前。オーケストラ、劇団、バンド、ポップグループなどが含まれる。

definition.en: A name of a family lineage, pedigree or blood relationship.
definition.ja: 家の血統、家系。

definition.en: A name of a community or population made up of people who identify with each other based on a common cultural background or decent.
definition.ja: 民族的な帰属意識を共有する集団。

definition.en: A name of an ethnic group (1.4.4 Ethnic_Group) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.4.4.1 Nationality).
definition.ja: 民族的な帰属意識を共有する集団であるが、国家を構成していないもの。

definition.en: A name of a nationality.
definition.ja: 人の国籍の名前。

definition.en: A name of an organization related to sports.
definition.ja: スポーツ、競技に関する組織。

definition.en: A name of an sports organization (1.4.5 Sports_Organization) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.4.5.1 - 1.4.5.3).
definition.ja: 競技組織の内、その下位クラスに属さないもの。

definition.en: A name of a governing body of a sport.
definition.ja: 各競技を統轄する組織。

definition.en: A name of an sport league, which is a group of sport teams that compete against each other, irrespective of professionals and amateurs.
definition.ja: アマチュア、プロを問わず、団体戦競技が行われるリーグ。

definition.en: A name of an organization where players of individual or team sport belong, irrespective of professionals and amateurs.
definition.ja: アマチュア、プロを問わず、また個人競技、団体競技を問わず競技に参加する選手が所属する組織。

definition.en: A name of a juridical person, which is a company, a group of people or an organization authorized to act as a single entity (legally a person) and recognized as such in law.
definition.ja: 社団法人、財団法人などの法人。

definition.en: A name of a juridical person (1.4.6 Juridical_Person) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.4.6.1 - 1.4.6.3).
definition.ja: 法人の内、その下位クラスに属さないもの。

definition.en:
A name of a nonprofit-oriented juridical person.
Examples are a public association, academic organization, public service corporation, labor union, etc. 
This includes a central bank and government agencies.
definition.ja:
営利目的で経済行為を行わない法人の名前。
公共の協会、財団、学会や公益法人、労働組合などの非営利団体などを含む。

definition.en: A name of a company, which is a legal entity formed by a group of individuals to engage in and operate a business enterprise.
definition.ja: 営利目的で経済行為を行う組織の名前。

definition.en: A name of a corporate group or group of companies, which is a collection of parent and subsidiary corporations that function as a single economic entity.
definition.ja: 財閥、もしくは親会社を中心とした企業グループにつけられた名称。

definition.en: A name of an organization that involves itself in the political process.
definition.ja: 政治活動を行う組織。

definition.en: A name of a political organization (1.4.7 Political_Organization) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.4.7.1 - 1.4.7.4).
definition.ja: 省庁、内閣、政党、軍隊以外の組織で政治活動を行うもの。

definition.en:
A name of a government, which is the organization determining and enforcing policies over a state. 
A government is any body run with tax, except those attributable to 1.5 Location or 1.6 Facility category (such as a court, city office or police station).
definition.ja: 各国の行政政府および立法の組織の名前。基本的には組織の運営に税金が使われているのであれば含めるが、ただし、裁判所や市役所、交番などの施設・場所として属性のあるものは除く。

definition.en: A name of a political party, which is an organized group of people who come together to engage in political activities. A smaller group inside a political party is not included here, but in 1.4.7.0 Political_Organization_Other Category.
definition.ja: 政治活動を行う政党や会派の名前。派閥など、政党内の小グループについては「政治的組織名＿その他」とする。

definition.en: A name of a cabinet, which is the highest administrative organ of a nation.
definition.ja: 国の行政権を担当する最高の合議機関。

definition.en: A name of a military or an armed force.
definition.ja: 軍事行動を行う組織。

definition.en: A name of a place or location.
definition.ja: 場所に関する名前。

definition.en:
A name of a place or location (1.5 Location) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.5.1 - 1.5.5).
This includes a spot such as an intersection, and a small district that is not used in postal address. 
This entity should be a word or phrase explaining the place or location of something.
definition.ja:
地名の内、その下位のクラスに属さないもの。
交差点など地点の名前や、郵便住所には現れない小さな地区の名前などを含む。
尚、場所を求める質問に対して不適切なものは含まない（例：宇宙→×）。

definition.en: A name of an administrative division which manage itself through its own government. GPE stands for Geological and Political Entity.
definition.ja: 政府を持つ地域。

definition.en:
A name of an administrative division (1.5.1 GPE) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.5.1.1 - 1.5.1.3).
Examples are a city state, polis, colony, overseas territory, special ward, etc.
definition.ja: ＧＰＥの内、その下位のクラスに属さないもの。 例えば、都市国家、ポリス、植民地、海外領、特別自治区など。

definition.en:
A name of a municipality like a city, town or village as a local self-governing body. 
This includes a district smaller than a municipality and used in postal address. 
An electoral district is not included here, but in 1.5.2.2 Domestic_Region Category.
definition.ja: 地方自治の行政機能を持つ市区町村の名前、または、 （郵便住所に含まれる）市区町村以下の公的な地区名。選挙区は国内地域名に含める。

definition.en:
A name of a first-level administrative division.
Examples are a state or province.
definition.ja:
国の行政区分。首長がおり、国によって下位に地方自治体を包含する。
例えば、都道府県、州、郡、省、道、カウンティ等。

definition.en: A name of a country.
definition.ja: 国の名前。

definition.en: A name of a region.
definition.ja: ある範囲の土地。

definition.en: A name of a region (1.5.2 Region) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.5.2.1 - 1.5.2.2).
definition.ja: 地域のうち、その下位のクラスに属さないもの。

definition.en: A name of a region larger than a country. This includes a continental area.
definition.ja:
国よりも大きな地域を差す名前。 
大陸を含む。

definition.en:
A name of a region inside a country which neither have its own government, nor used in postal address. The region should refer to an area bigger than a city. 
This includes a popular name of a region, an electoral district, or a manor.
definition.ja:
国の中の一部の地域で、自治体を持たず、かつ郵便住所として公式に 認められてない地域を差す名前。
地域と認められうる範囲を持つことが必要。 市よりも大きい地域を指す場合に用いる。市よりも小さい場合は「地名＿その他」に分類する。
 特定の地域の通称や荘園、選挙区を含む。

definition.en: A name of a geological region, which is an area of any size that can be separated from surrounding land on the basis of its shape.
definition.ja: 地形の名前。

definition.en:
A name of a geological region (1.5.3 Geological_Region) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.5.3.1 - 1.5.3.7).
Examples are a peninsula, plain, geologic fault, stalactite cave, etc.
definition.ja:
地形名の内、その下位のクラスに属さないもの。 
例えば、山地、島、河川湖沼、海洋、湾でもない地形。半島、平野、断層、鍾乳洞等。

definition.en:
A name of a hot spring or spa.
This includes an area crowded with hot spring facilities.
definition.ja:
温泉の名前。
温泉施設が密集している地域を含む。

definition.en: A name of a mountain, a group of mountains, or any hill. This includes a mountain range, hügelland, dune, highland, or mountain pass.
definition.ja:
山の名前。 
山脈、山地、丘陵、高原、砂丘、峠、高地等を含む。

definition.en: A name of an island or a group of islands.
definition.ja:
島の名前。
諸島、列島、群島等を含む。

definition.en:
A name of a river. 
An artificial facility such as a canal is not included here, but in 1.6.6.3 Canal Category.
A riverside area is also not included here but in 1.5.3.0 Geological_Region_Other Category, for it refers to the coastal land area.
definition.ja:
川の名前。
用水路や運河等の施設は含まない（運河名等へ）。
河岸等の陸地部分は含まない（地形＿その他へ）。

definition.en:
A name of a lake, marsh or pond. 
An artificial facility such as a dam is not included here, but in 1.6.2 Dam Category.
A lakeside area is also not included here but in 1.5.3.0 Geological_Region_Other Category, for it refers to the coastal land area.
definition.ja:
湖沼の名前。
湖 、沼、池、泉等を含む。
ダム等の施設は含まない（ダム名等へ）。
湖畔等の陸地部分は含まない（地形名＿その他へ）。

definition.en:
A name of a sea, an ocean, or a part of it.
This includes a strait, or an offshore area. 
A shore or beach is not included here but in 1.5.3.0 Geological_Region_Other Category, for it refers to the coastal land area.
definition.ja:
海、海洋の名前。
海峡、海門、沖等を含む。
浜・海岸などの陸地部分は含まない（地形＿その他へ）。

definition.en: A name of a bay.
definition.ja: 湾の名前。

definition.en: A name of an astronomical object that exists in the universe.
definition.ja: 宇宙に存在する星などの名前。

definition.en:
A name of an astronomical object (1.5.4 Astronomical_Object) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.5.4.1 - 1.5.4.3).
Examples are a galaxy, nebula, comet, satellite, interstellar substance, planetary system, etc. 
An artificial satellite is not included here but in 1.7.17.4 Spaceship Category.
definition.ja:
天体名の内、その下位のクラスに属さないもの。
銀河、星雲、星団、彗星、衛星、星間物質、惑星系などを含む。
人工衛星は含まない（宇宙船名へ）。

definition.en: A name of a star except the Sun.
definition.ja:
恒星の名前。
太陽は含まない（惑星名へ）。

definition.en: A name of a planet or asteroid in the Solar System.
definition.ja:
太陽系内の惑星の名前。
小惑星を含む。

definition.en: A name of a constellation, which is a group of stars that forms an imaginary outline or pattern on the celestial sphere.
definition.ja: 星座の名前。

definition.en: An address.
definition.ja: 住所・アドレス。

definition.en: An address (1.5.5 Address) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.5.5.1 Postal_Address).
definition.ja: アドレスの内、その下位のクラスに属さないもの。

definition.en:
A postal address that includes a lot number, street number, or a house number. 
This includes a zip code.
definition.ja: 郵便用の住所。番地以下の記載があるもの。郵便番号のみでも含む。

definition.en: A name of a place or building that provides a particular service.
definition.ja: 建物や場所としての属性を持つ施設の名前。

definition.en: A name of a facility (1.6 Facility) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.6.1 - 1.6.6).
definition.ja: 施設名の内、その下位のクラスに属さないもの。

definition.en:
A name of a part of a facility.
Examples are a floor of a building, a room of a hotel, an exit of a station, or a dockside of a port.
definition.ja:
施設の部分の名前。
例えば、ビルの階、ホテルの部屋、駅の出口、波止場等。

definition.en: A name of a dam, which is a barrier that stops or restricts the flow of water or underground streams for the purpose of storing water, generating electricity, etc.
definition.ja: 発電、貯水等の目的で水を堰き止めるための施設。

definition.en: A name of an archaeological site.
definition.ja: 遺構もしくは遺物があるところ。

definition.en:
A name of an archaeological site (1.6.3 Archaeological_Place) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.6.3.1 Tomb). 
Examples are historic remains, castle ruins, or remained sites.
definition.ja:
古墳以外の遺跡。
例えば、遺跡、遺跡群、跡地、城址等。

definition.en:
A name of a grave or tomb. 
This includes ancient ones as well as new ones.
definition.ja:
墓の名前。
古墳から新しい墓までのすべてを含む。

definition.en: A name of a place or building which is at the same time recognized and have a voice as an organization (e.g. the White House). FOE stands for Facility and Organizational Entity.
definition.ja: 建物や場所としての属性の他に組織名としての属性も持つ施設の名前。主体となって発言するような施設の名前（例：ホワイトハウスが発表した）。

definition.en: A name of an organizational facility (1.6.4 FOE) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.6.4.1 - 1.6.4.18).
definition.ja: ＦＯＥの内、その下位のクラスに属さないもの。

definition.en: A name of a military base, which is a facility directly owned and operated by or for the military.
definition.ja: 軍隊の活動拠点となる施設。

definition.en: A name of a castle, which is a building fortified against attack.
definition.ja: 防備のための施設。

definition.en: A name of a palace, which is a grand residence, especially a royal residence, or the home of a head of state or some other high-ranking dignitary, such as a bishop or archbishop.
definition.ja:
王族、皇族、君主、教皇の居住地。
御用邸、離宮等の別荘を含む。

definition.en:
A name of a public facility and organization. 
Examples are a public office, police box, post office, courthouse, public clinic, and public center.
definition.ja:
建造物、場所としての属性がある公共機関の名前。
例えば、役所、交番、郵便局、裁判所、相談所、センター等。

definition.en:
A name of a lodging or holiday accommodation facility. 
Examples are a hotel, motel, inn, pension, or a youth hostel.
definition.ja:
人が泊まるための施設。
ホテル、旅館、ペンション、ユースホテル等。

definition.en: A name of a medical institution.
definition.ja: 医療を提供する施設。

definition.en:
A name of a school. 
This includes a kindergarten, cram school, or vocational school.
definition.ja:
学校の名前。
例えば、幼稚園、保育園、予備校、訓練所、養成所、塾等を含む。

definition.en: A name of a research institute, or other related facility such as an astronomical observatory.
definition.ja:
研究機関の名前。
例えば、研究所や天文台等。

definition.en: A name of a exchange or market, such as a stock exchange or commodity exchange.
definition.ja:
常設の取引所・市場の名前。
例えば、証券取引所、商品取引所等。

definition.en: A name of a power plant.
definition.ja: 発電のための施設。

definition.en: A name of a park or garden.
definition.ja: 公園、庭園の名前。

definition.en:
A name of a shop, or a complex of shops.
This includes a commercial complex which has entertainment venues such as movie theaters, restaurants or game centers.
This includes a department store, a neighborhood center, or a commercial district.
definition.ja:
個人商店の名前及び複数の店舗が集まった施設。
例えば、デパートなどのショッピングセンター等。
映画館、レストラン、ゲームセンター併設の複合商業施設や地下街、商店街を含む。

definition.en:
A name of a sport-related facility.
Examples are an athletics ground, a stadium, a baseball park, etc.
definition.ja:
スポーツ施設の名前。
例えば、野球場、ラグビー場、陸上競技場、武道場等。

definition.en: A name of a museum.
definition.ja:
美術館や博物館の名前。
記念館を含む。

definition.en: A name of a zoo, botanic garden, or aquarium.
definition.ja: 動物園、植物園、水族館等の名前。

definition.en: A name of an amusement park, theme park or fair.
definition.ja:
遊園施設の名前。
テーマパークを含む。

definition.en: A name of a theater, where theatrical works or plays are performed.
definition.ja:
観劇用の施設の名前。
例えば、劇場やシアター等。

definition.en:
A name of a place or house of worship, which is a structure where people come to perform acts of devotion, veneration, or religious study. 
Examples are a church, a temple and a shrine.
definition.ja:
宗教に関する祭事を主な目的にした施設の名前。
例えば、神社仏閣、教会等。

definition.en: A name of a facility used in the transportation system.
definition.ja: 各種交通機関の施設。

definition.en: A name of a transportation facility (1.6.5 Transport_Facility) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.6.5.1 - 1.6.5.4).
definition.ja: 交通施設の内、その下位のクラスに属さないもの。

definition.en:
A name of a designated place where cars stop, such as a bus station or stop.
This includes a parking lot, or a rest area on a highway.
definition.ja:
車が停車する場所。
例えば、バスなどの自動車が発着するバスターミナル、停留所等。
駐車場、パーキングエリアを含む。

definition.en: A name of a train or subway station, which is a railway facility or area where trains regularly stop to load or unload passengers or freight.
definition.ja: 鉄道が発着し、客や貨物の積み下ろしをする駅の名前。

definition.en: A name of an airport or aerodrome.
definition.ja: 空港、飛行場の名前。

definition.en: A name of a maritime commercial facility such as a port, harbor, wharf or dock, where ships dock to load and discharge passengers and cargo.
definition.ja: 海港や船着場など船の出入りする施設の名前。

definition.en:
A name of a line or route for transportation. 
An overhead power line is not included here but in 1.6.0 Facility_Other Category.
definition.ja:
人が移動する為に用いる路線の名前。 
送電線等は含まない（施設名へ）。

definition.en:
A name of a line (1.6.6 Line) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.6.6.1 - 1.6.6.6).
Examples are an air route, and Silk Road.
definition.ja:
路線の内、その下位のクラスに属さないもの。 
例えば、航空路や、大まかな道のりを指す「シルクロード」等。

definition.en: A name of a train line, subway line, or monorail line.
definition.ja:
鉄道路線の名前。
例えば、電車、地下鉄、モノレール等。

definition.en:
A name of a road, which is a route or way on land improved to allow travel by foot, motor vehicle, bicycle, or horse. 
This does not include an intersection or junction, instead, it should be attributed to 1.5.0 Location_Other Category.
definition.ja:
自動車、自転車、人のための道路。 
交差点（地名＿その他へ）やジャンクション（交通施設名＿その他へ）等は含まない。

definition.en: A name of an artificial waterway such as a canal.
definition.ja: 人工的に陸地を掘ってつくった水路。

definition.en: A name of a route that ships use.
definition.ja: 船が通る道筋。

definition.en: A name of a tunnel. It may be for foot or vehicular road traffic, for rail traffic, or for a canal.
definition.ja: トンネルの名前。 通るものは人間でも鉄道でも電車でも構わない。

definition.en: A name of a bridge. It may be for foot, for vehicular road traffic, for rail traffic, or for a canal.
definition.ja: 川などに掛る橋の名前。 渡るものは人間でも鉄道でも電車でも構わない。

definition.en: A name of a thing or abstract concept produced by the intent of human beings.
definition.ja: 人間が製造したもの（具象・抽象ともに含む）の名前。

definition.en: A name of a product or service (1.7 Product) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.7.1 - 1.7.25).
definition.ja:
製品名の内、その下位のクラスに属さないもの。
物品のみでなく、抽象的な製品（サービスなど）も含む。

definition.en:
A name of a video production.
Examples are an animation, music video, television advertisement, television show, movie, etc.
This includes a video record released in the form of a disk, such as a concert film.
definition.ja:
映像作品の名前。
例えば、OVA、ビデオクリップ、PV、CM等。
ディスク等のかたちで発売されたコンサートツアーを含む。
CMを含む。

definition.en: A name of a musical instrument.
definition.ja: 楽器の名前。

definition.en:
A name of clothing, what can be worn on the body. 
This includes clothes, shoes, or a hat.
definition.ja:
人が身につけるもの。
頭に被るものから足に履くものまでを含む。

definition.en: A name of a form of money, such as a bill, banknote, or coin.
definition.ja:
貨幣の名前。
例えば、鋳貨・紙幣・銀行券などのお金、コイン等。

definition.en:
A name of a medication, which is a drug used to diagnose, cure, treat or prevent human disease. 
Drugs with other purposes (such as a pesticide or narcotic) are not included here, but in 1.7.0 Product_Other Category.
definition.ja:
医療目的で人間に投与する医薬品の名前。
殺虫剤や医療目的以外の麻薬等の薬品は含まない（製品名＿その他へ）。

definition.en: A name of a weapon, arm or armament.
definition.ja: 武器、兵器などの名前。

definition.en: A name of a stock or share.
definition.ja: 株の銘柄。

definition.en: A name of an award, prize or medal, which is a thing given as a reward to the winner of a competition or in recognition of an outstanding achievement.
definition.ja: コンペティションの勝利者、もしくは、優れた功績に与えられる賞の名前。

definition.en: A name of an order or state decoration, that is awarded by a sovereign state to honor the recipient.
definition.ja: 国家・社会に対する功労者を表彰して国家から与えられる記章。

definition.en:
A name of a crime or rap, that is an unlawful act punishable by a state or other authority. 
The entity in this category should fill in the following phrases: "the crime of __" or "suspicion of __".
definition.ja: 違法・不法行為である罪や逮捕されるような容疑の名前。「〜罪」「〜（の）容疑」「〜の疑い」をつけて不自然ではない名詞句。

definition.en:
A service identification name or number of transport facilities, such as a flight number of plane, train, or bus. 
An ID number given to a vehicle (e.g. Boeing 777) is not included here, but in 1.7.14 ID_Number Category.
definition.ja:
飛行機、電車、定期バスなどの便の名前。
乗物自体についているID番号は含まない（識別番号へ）。

definition.en: A name of a class, grade or rank given to a person, a group of people, or an organization, in a sport or other field.
definition.ja: スポーツやその他の競技にいて、個人や団体に与えられる等級。等級、階級、段、級等。

definition.en:
A name of a fictional character. This includes the characters of a story. 
A name of a fictional animal that appear in more than one work, like "werewolf" is not included here but in 1.10.4.0 Living_Thing_Other Category. Other fictional animal that only appear in a specific work, like "Pikachu", is included.
definition.ja:
創作上のキャラクター。物語の登場人物を含む。
動物の種類を表すことばのうち、「狼男」のように複数の作品に登場するものは「生物名＿その他」、「ピカチュウ」のように固有の作品でのみ登場するものは「キャラクター名」とする。

definition.en:
An identification number. This can be a string of numerals, or other character string.
Examples are a passport number, driver's license number, serial number or uniform number.
definition.ja:
番号や文字列で表される識別番号。
例えば、免許証番号、パスポート番号、製造番号、背番号等。

definition.en: A name of a game.
definition.ja: ゲームの名前。

definition.en: A name of a game (1.7.15 Game) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.7.15.1 Digital_Game). A board game is an example of this category.
definition.ja:
デジタルではないゲーム。
例えば、ボードゲーム等。

definition.en: A name of a digital game such as a video game.
definition.ja: デジタルのゲーム。

definition.en:
A name of a computer software.
Examples are an computer program, library, web application, or programming language.
definition.ja:
ソフトウェアの名前。
例えば、アプリケーション、プログラミング言語、プラットフォーム、パッケージ等。

definition.en: A name of a vehicle.
definition.ja: 移動するための乗り物の名前。

definition.en:
A name of a vehicle (1.7.17 Vehicle) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.7.17.1 - 1.7.17.5). 
Examples are a name of a bicycle and a carriage.
definition.ja:
乗り物名の内、その下位のクラスに属さないもの。
馬車、自転車等を含む。

definition.en: A name of a car or motorcycle.
definition.ja:
自動車の名前。
自動二輪車を含む。

definition.en: A name of a train or subway.
definition.ja: 電車、列車、地下鉄の名前。

definition.en: A name of an aircraft.
definition.ja: 飛行機の名前。

definition.en:
A name of a space vehicle.
This includes a spaceship, space station, or satellite.
definition.ja:
宇宙船の名前。
宇宙ステーション、人工衛星を含む。

definition.en: A name of a ship.
definition.ja:
船の名前。
艦級を含む。

definition.en: A name of a food or drink, which is any substance intended for human consumption.
definition.ja: 食べ物、飲み物の名前。

definition.en:
A name of a food (1.7.18) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.7.18.1 Dish). 
This includes names of ingredients used for cooking, and brand names of food products. 
The entity in this category is the word or phrase that cannot fill the following phrases: "homemade __" and "__ recipe".
definition.ja: 料理に使う原材料や商品名。「手作りの○○」、「○○のレシピ」という言い方が法律的にできない、登録商標されている飲食物など。

definition.en:
A name of a dish. 
The entity in this category is the word or phrase filling the following phrases: "homemade __" and "__ recipe".
definition.ja: 料理の名前。「手作りの○○」「○○のレシピ」という語句が成立するもの。

definition.en: A name of a work of art.
definition.ja: 芸術作品の名前。

definition.en:
A name of a work of art (1.7.19 Art) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.7.19.1 - 1.7.19.6). 
Examples are a name of a sculpture or a picture scroll.
definition.ja:
芸術作品名の内、その下位のクラスに属さないもの。
例えば、芸術、彫刻、絵巻物等。

definition.en: A name of a painting or drawing.
definition.ja: 絵画の名前。

definition.en:
A name of a broadcast media program, such as a Television show or a radio program. 
This includes a certain segment of these programs.
definition.ja:
テレビ、ラジオ、インターネット上などの放送番組の名前。
番組内のコーナーを含む。

definition.en:
A name of a movie. 
This includes a television film.
definition.ja:
映画の名前。
劇場公開したもののみ。テレビ映画は含まない。

definition.en:
A name of a show, that is an entertainment performed on stage.
Examples are a musical, opera, play, or ballet.
definition.ja:
舞台で公演されるものの名前。
例えば、歌舞伎、ミュージカル、オペラ、演劇等。

definition.en:
A name of a music or song. 
This includes an album title of an artist.
definition.ja:
音楽の名前。
例えば、歌、楽曲などのタイトル等。
アルバムタイトル等を含む。

definition.en:
A name of a written or verbal work of any form. 
Examples are a book, poetry, comics, dictionary, myth, or folklore.
definition.ja:
書物や文学（口承文学、神話、伝説などを含む言葉で表現された芸術）の名前。
例えば、文学、書籍、漫画、辞書等。

definition.en:
A name of a printing excluding a book. 
This includes those not published.
definition.ja:
書籍以外で、紙に書かれているものの名前。
実際に出版されていないものを含む。

definition.en:
A name of a printing (1.7.20 Printing) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.7.20.1 - 1.7.20.2). 
Examples are a calendar, booklet, brochure, or declaration.
definition.ja:
出版物名の内、その下位のクラスに属さないもの。
例えば、カレンダーやパンフレット、宣言文等。

definition.en: A name of a newspaper.
definition.ja: 新聞の名前。

definition.en: A name of a periodical publication except a newspaper.
definition.ja:
定期刊行の出版物の名前。
新聞を含まない（新聞名へ）。

definition.en: A name of a doctrine or method, which is formed based on certain beliefs, thoughts or arts.
definition.ja: その成り立ちにおいて、主義・思想・方式が関与するもの。

definition.en:
A name of a doctrine or method (1.7.21 Doctrine_Method) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.7.21.1 - 1.7.21.8). 
This includes a belief, principal or thought that becomes a guideline for people's action, and a system such as a taxation system, literal characters, or calendar.
definition.ja: 行動の指針となる主義や思想の名前。もしくは、税制、文字、暦などの、方式や制度の名前。

definition.en: A name of a culture, civilization, or art.
definition.ja: 文化、文明、美術の名前。

definition.en: A name of a religion or religious sect.
definition.ja:
宗教の名前。
宗派、教団を含む。

definition.en: A name of an academic field.
definition.ja: 学問の名前。

definition.en: A name of a sport in which the superiority of the player can be judged.
definition.ja: 優劣をつけられるスポーツの名前。

definition.en: A name of a school, style or method of an art or science.
definition.ja:
武道・学問・技芸などの特有の手法・様式。 
例えば、流派、流儀、学派等。

definition.en: A name of a social movement or activity took place based on a common principle or thought.
definition.ja: 共通の主義思想をもとに起こされる社会運動。

definition.en: A name of a theory or natural law.
definition.ja:
学説、法則などの理論の名前。 
例えば、理論、学説、法則等。

definition.en:
A name of a policy or plan, or a draft of it, which is determined before action. 
A law or regulation, or its draft is not included here, but in 1.7.22 Rule Category. 
A tax plan is also not included here, but in 1.7.21 Doctrine_Method_Other Category.
definition.ja:
実行前に決められた方針、方策の名前。
例えば、計画、構想、案と 呼ばれるものや、政策等。
法案、条例案は含まない（規則名へ）。
税案は含まない（主義方式名＿その他へ）。

definition.en: A name of a rule such as a treaty or statute.
definition.ja: 条約や法令などの規則。

definition.en:
A name of a rule (1.7.22 Rule) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.7.22.1 - 1.7.22.2). 
This includes a draft of a treaty, law or statute.
definition.ja: 法律、条約以外などの取り決め。法律、条約などの試案を含む。

definition.en:
A name of a treaty, which is a formally concluded and ratified agreement between states or organizations. 
This includes an article of a treaty.
definition.ja:
国家間もしくは、複数の組織の間で取り決められた合意。
条項を含む。

definition.en: A name of a law, statute or order. This category includes an article of a law.
definition.ja: 法律と命令。 法律の条項も含む。

definition.en: A name of a title, position, or occupation.
definition.ja: 称号、地位、職業。

definition.en: A name of a title (1.7.23 Title) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.7.23.1 Position_Vocation).
definition.ja: 称号名の内、その下位のクラスに属さないもの。

definition.en: A name an occupation, or a position that indicates the status of a person.
definition.ja: 階位や地位など人のステイタスを表すものや、 職業を表すもの。

definition.en: A name of a language, language family, or dialect.
definition.ja: 公用語、語族、方言。

definition.en:
A name of a language (1.7.24 Language) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.7.24.1 National_Language). 
This includes a dialect or a language family.
definition.ja:
方言など、公用語以外の言語。
語族を含む。

definition.en: A name of a national language.
definition.ja: 公の場で使用されることが正式に認められている国語。

definition.en: A name of a unit of measurement, which is a fixed standard quantity, length or weight that is used for measuring things.
definition.ja: 長さ、質量、金額などを表す単位。

definition.en: A name of a unit (1.7.25 Unit) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.7.25.1 Currency).
definition.ja: 単位名の内、その下位のクラスに属さないもの。

definition.en:
A name of a currency unit. 
The entity is named along with a figure is not included here but in 3.1 Numex Category. 
A name of a form of money such as a coin or bill is also not included here, but in 1.7.4 Money_Form Category.
definition.ja:
通貨の名前。
「数字＋通貨単位」の場合は含まない（金額表現へ）。 コインや紙幣は含まない（貨幣名へ）。
来店や購入金額に応じて特典が得られるようなポイントプログラムの名前は含まない（製品名＿その他へ）。

definition.en: A character string (consists of characters such as numerals, marks, alphabets, etc.) that specify an user or something.
definition.ja: ユーザなどを特定する記号、数字、アルファベット等の並び。

name.ja: バーチャルアドレス名

definition.en:
A virtual address (1.8 Virtual_Address) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.8.1 - 1.8.4).
A part of an URL is an example of this category.
definition.ja:
バーチャルアドレスの内、その下位のクラスに属さないもの。
例えば、URLの一部等。

name.ja: バーチャルアドレス名＿その他

definition.en:
A channel of a broadcast media such as the television, radio or streaming television. 
This includes a name of a website.
definition.ja:
ラジオやテレビなどのチャンネル。
インターネット上のチャンネル名を含む。
ウェブサイトの名前を含む。

definition.en: A phone or fax number.
definition.ja:
電話番号。
ＦＡＸなど別の目的に使われているものを含む。

definition.en: An email address.
definition.ja:
電子メイルアドレス。
ウェブサイトのアドレスはＵＲＬとする。

definition.en: A web address, or URL.
definition.ja: インターネットのページアドレス、ＵＲＬ。

definition.en: A name of an event or matter.
definition.ja: イベントの名前。　出来事の名前。

definition.en:
A name of an event (1.9 Event) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.9.1 - 1.9.3).
Social news and events other than incidents are examples of this category.
definition.ja:
ベント名の内、その下位のクラスに属さないもの。
例えば、戦争、事故事件名以外の社会的出来事・現象の名前。

definition.en: A name of an occasion or event that people hold on a regular basis, or a limited period of time, such as a festival, exhibition, etc.
definition.ja:
人間が行う、祭、展覧会などの催し物の名前。
定期的に開催されるイベントや、期間・内容等があらかじめ決まっているようなイベントを含む。

definition.en: A name of an occasion (1.9.1 Occasion) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.9.1.1 - 1.9.1.4).
definition.ja: 催し物名の内、その下位のクラスに属さないもの。

definition.en: A name of an election.
definition.ja: 選挙の名前。

definition.en: A name of a religious or traditional ceremony, festival or event that is held on a regular basis.
definition.ja: 定期的に行われる宗教的もしくは民族的行事。

definition.en: A name of a competition or game of a sport, or an event competing the superiority of any skill.
definition.ja:
スポーツなどの競技大会の名前。
コンクールなどのスポーツ以外の競技会を含む。

definition.en: A name of a conference.
definition.ja: 会議の名前。

definition.en: A name of an accident or incident.
definition.ja: 事故、事件、戦争など、突発的に起こった出来事。

definition.en: A name of an incident (1.9.2 Incident) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.9.2.1 War).
definition.ja: 戦争以外の事故や事件の名前。

definition.en: A name of a war or battle.
definition.ja: 戦争の名前。

definition.en: A name of a natural phenomenon or natural disaster.
definition.ja: 風、海流などの自然現象および、地震、火事、噴火、津波、台風など、自然が原因となる災害。

definition.en:
A name of a natural phenomenon (1.9.3 Natural_Phenomenon) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.9.3.1 - 1.9.3.2).
A natural phenomenon which happens regularly on a certain place, such as an anticyclone, prevailing wind, or oceanic current, is included.
definition.ja:
自然現象名の内、その下位のクラスに属さないもの。
時期と場所をある程度限定する現象として名づけられたもの等を含む。

definition.en:
A name of a natural disaster except an earthquake.
Examples are volcanic eruptions, floods, hurricanes, etc.
definition.ja:
地震以外の自然災害名の名前。
飢饉、台風、ハリケーン、噴火等を含む。

definition.en: A name of an earthquake.
definition.ja: 地震によって起こされた災害。

definition.en: A name of a natural object or material.
definition.ja: 自然界の有形物の名前。

definition.en: A name of a natural object (1.10 Natural_Object) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.10.1 - 1.10.4).
definition.ja: 自然物名の内、その下位のクラスに属さないもの。

definition.en: A name of a chemical element.
definition.ja: 原子によって構成される物質。

definition.en: A name of a chemical compound except a mineral.
definition.ja:
化合によってできた物質。
鉱物は含まない(鉱物名へ)。

definition.en: A name of a mineral.
definition.ja: 鉱物の名前。

definition.en: A name of a living thing.
definition.ja: 生物の名前。

definition.en:
A name of a living thing (1.10.4 Living_Thing) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.10.4.1 - 1.10.4.9).
This includes a name of bacteria, virus, cnidarian, echinoderm, etc. 
This also includes a name of imaginary animal that appears in several works.
definition.ja:
生物名の内、その下位のクラスに属さないもの。
棘皮動物、刺胞動物、生物、ウイルス、細菌等を含む。
複数の作品に登場するような空想上の動物等を含む。

definition.en: A name of a fungus such as a mold, mushroom, or yeast.
definition.ja: かび類・きのこ類および酵母菌類の名前。

definition.en: A name of a mollusk or an arthropod except an insect.
definition.ja:
軟体動物と、昆虫類を除く節足動物の名前。
例えば、無脊椎動物、 貝、甲殻類等。

definition.en: A name of an insect.
definition.ja: 昆虫の名前。

definition.en: A name of a fish.
definition.ja: 魚類の名前。

definition.en: A name of an Amphibia.
definition.ja: 両生類の動物の名前。

definition.en: A name of a reptile.
definition.ja: 爬虫類の動物の名前。

definition.en: A name of a bird.
definition.ja: 鳥類の名前。

definition.en: A name of a mammal.
definition.ja: 哺乳類の動物の名前。

definition.en: A name of a plant.
definition.ja: 植物の名前。

definition.en: A name of a part, section or organ of an animal's body or plant's body.
definition.ja: 動物と植物の部位の名前。

definition.en: A name of a part, section or organ that both an animal and a plant have.
definition.ja: 動物、植物共有の部位。

definition.en: A name of a part, section or organ that only an animal has.
definition.ja: 動物のみが持っている部位の名前。

definition.en: A name of a part, section or organ that only a plant has.
definition.ja: 植物のみが持っている部位の名前。

definition.en: A name of a disease.
definition.ja: 動物と植物がかかる病気の名前。

definition.en:
A name of a disease (1.11 Disease) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.11.1 Animal_Disease).
Diseases of plants are examples of this category.
definition.ja:
病気名の内、その下位のクラスに属さないもの。
植物がかかる病気等。

definition.en: A name of an animal disease or injury.
definition.ja: 病気や怪我等の動物がかかる病気。

definition.en: A name of a color.
definition.ja: 色の名前。

definition.en: A name of a color (1.12 Color) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (1.12.1 Nature_Color).
definition.ja: 日本語と英語の基本色彩語以外の色の名前。

definition.en:
A name of a natural color, which is a basic color of the United States and Japan defined by Brent O. Berlin and Paul D. Kay. 
There are eleven colors that belong to this category: white, gray, black, red, yellow, green, blue, purple, orange, pink, and brown.
definition.ja:
人類学者のブレント・バーリンととポール・ケイが定義した日本語と英語の基本色彩語。
「白」「灰」「黒」「赤」「黄」「緑」「青」「紫」「オレンジ/橙」「ピンク/桃」「茶/褐」の１１色がそれに当たる。

definition.en: An expression indicating time.
definition.ja: 時間に関する表現。

definition.en: An expression indicating time (2 Timex) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (2.1 - 2.2).
definition.ja: 時間表現の内、その下位のクラスに属さないもの 。

definition.en: An expression of a point of time.
definition.ja: 時間。ある特定の一点（時期）を指す。

definition.en: An expression of a point of time (2.1 Timeex) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (2.1.1 - 2.1.4).
definition.ja: 時間のうち、下位のクラスに入らないもの。

definition.en: An expression of a time of a day.
definition.ja: 時刻を表す表現。

definition.en: An expression of a date.
definition.ja: 日付に関する表現。ただし、「今日」「昨年」などというような照応表現はのぞく。

definition.en: An expression of a day of a week.
definition.ja: 曜日の表現

definition.en: An expression of an era.
definition.ja: 時代の名前。「～時代」「～期」「～世紀」等。

definition.en: An expression of a period of time.
definition.ja: 期間。

definition.en: An expression of a period of time (2.2 Periodx) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (2.2.1 - 2.2.5).
definition.ja: 期間の内、その下位のクラスに属さないもの。

definition.en: An expression of a period of seconds, minutes or hours.
definition.ja: 時刻期間の表現。

definition.en: An expression of a period of days.
definition.ja: 日数期間の表現。

definition.en: An expression of a period of weeks.
definition.ja: 週数期間の表現。

definition.en: An expression of a period of months.
definition.ja: 月数期間の表現。

definition.en: An expression of a period of years.
definition.ja: 年数期間の表現。

definition.en: An expression indicating the number of something.
definition.ja: 数値を含む表現。

definition.en: An expression indicating the number of something (3 Numex) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (3.1 - 3.13).
definition.ja: 数値表現の内、その下位のクラスに属さないもの。

definition.en: An expression indicating the amount of money.
definition.ja: 金額を表す表現。

definition.en: An expression of stock market indexes.
definition.ja: 株の指標を表す表現。

definition.en: An expression of points or scores.
definition.ja: ポイント（点数、得点など）を表す表現。

definition.en: An expression of ratio.
definition.ja: 割合を表す表現。

definition.en: An expression of multiplication.
definition.ja: 倍数を表す表現。

definition.en: An expression of frequency.
definition.ja: 頻度を表す表現。

definition.en: An expression of age.
definition.ja: 年齢を表す表現。

definition.en: An expression of grade in school.
definition.ja: 学齢を表す表現。

definition.en: An expression of an ordinal number.
definition.ja: 序数。順序を表す数。

definition.en: An expression of ranking given to the result of a competition.
definition.ja: 競技、コンテストなどでの結果の順位を表す表現。

definition.en: An expression of latitude or longitude.
definition.ja: 緯度経度を表す表現。

definition.en: An expression of measurement.
definition.ja: 寸法を表す表現。

definition.en: An expression of measurement (3.12 Measurement) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (3.12.1 - 3.12.10).
definition.ja: 寸法表現の内、その下位のクラスに属さないもの。

definition.en: An expression of physical extent; length or height of something.
definition.ja: 長さを表す表現。

definition.en: An expression of area.
definition.ja: 面積を表す表現。

definition.en: An expression of volume.
definition.ja: 体積を表す表現。

definition.en: An expression of weight.
definition.ja: 重量を表す表現。

definition.en: An expression of speed.
definition.ja: 速度を表す表現。

definition.en: An expression of intensity.
definition.ja: 密度を表す表現。

definition.en: An expression of temperature.
definition.ja: 温度を表す表現。

definition.en: An expression of calorie.
definition.ja: カロリー（熱量）を表す表現。

definition.en: An expression of seismic intensity.
definition.ja: 震度を表す表現。マグニチュードではない。

definition.en: An expression of magnitude.
definition.ja: 地震のマグニチュードを表す表現。

definition.en: An expression of counts.
definition.ja: 個数。

definition.en: An expression of counts (3.13 Countx) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (3.13.1 - 3.13.7).
definition.ja: 個数の内、その下位のクラスに属さないもの。

definition.en: An expression of the number of people.
definition.ja: 人の数。

definition.en: An expression of the number of organizations.
definition.ja: 組織の数。

definition.en: An expression of the number of places.
definition.ja: 場所の数。

definition.en: An expression of the number of places (3.13.3 N_Location) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (3.13.3.1 N_Location_Other).
definition.ja: 場所数の内、その下位のクラスに属さないもの。

definition.en: An expression of the number of countries.
definition.ja: 国の数。

definition.en: An expression of the number of facilities.
definition.ja: 施設の数。

definition.en: An expression of the number of products.
definition.ja: 製品の数。

definition.en: An expression of the number of events.
definition.ja: イベントの数。

definition.en: An expression of the number of natural objects.
definition.ja: 自然物の個数。

definition.en: An expression of the number of natural objects (3.13.7 N_Natural_Object) that do not belong to any of the other subordinate categories (3.13.7.1 - 3.13.7.2).
definition.ja: 物、植物以外の自然物の個数。 動物部位や植物部位の個数を含む。

definition.en: An expression of the number of animals excluding human beings.
definition.ja: 人間を除く動物の個数。

definition.en: An expression of the number of plants.
definition.ja: 植物の個数。

definition.en: Anything other than entities which have one of the ENE categories. Typically, Common nouns.
definition.ja: ENEカテゴリに該当しない全てのエンティティ。典型的には一般名詞。

definition.en: Pages which is a meta information for Wikipedia, including "list page", "disambiguation page" and "forward page".
definition.ja: 百科事典としての見出し語ではないもの。Wikipedia固有のメタ情報や、一覧情報など。
